#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
const int N = 2e5 + 5; 

int start[N], finish[N], winner[N][26];
bool win[N];

void solve(){

    memset(winner, 0, sizeof(winner));
    memset(win, 0, sizeof(win));

    int n, k;
    string temp;
    cin>>n>>k;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
        cin>>temp;
        start[i] = temp[0] - 'a';
        finish[i] = temp[temp.length() - 1] - 'a';
    }

    for(int i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--){
        if(winner[i + 1][finish[i]] - winner[i + k + 1][finish[i]] == 0)   win[i] = true;
        else win[i] = false;
        for(int j = 0; j < 26; j++) winner[i][j] = winner[i + 1][j];
        if(win[i]) winner[i][start[i]]++;
    }

    bool ans = false;

    for(int i = 0; i < k; i++)  ans = max(ans, win[i]);

    if(ans) cout<<"Alex"<<endl;
    else cout<<"Bob"<<endl;
}

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)  solve();
    return 0;
}
